news.title: What the Budget means for you and your money
news.summary: The Budget being delivered by Chancellor Rachel Reeves will affect you and your finances.

news.title: Budget 2025: Key points at a glance
news.summary: Rachel Reeves is delivering her second Budget since Labour’s return to power – here’s what you need to know.

news.title: Henry Zeffman: Early release of Budget detail is totally surreal
news.summary: The Budget is already out there, thanks to the Office for Budget Responsibility, which has published the details in error.

news.title: Paul Doyle pleads guilty to Liverpool parade charges
news.summary: Paul Doyle broke down in tears as he admitted seriously injuring fans at Liverpool's victory parade.

news.title: Trump defends envoy after leak appears to show him coaching Russia
news.summary: The US president said he had not heard the audio, but that it sounded like "standard" negotiations.

news.title: Army halts use of Ajax vehicles after soldiers fall ill
news.summary: The UK government previously said they were ready for deployment with interest from Nato allies.

news.title: Australian teens launch court challenge to social media ban
news.summary: They argue the law - which will block users under 16 from having social media accounts - is unconstitutional.

news.title: Italian parliament unanimously votes to make femicide a crime
news.summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.

news.title: Council says it will continue legal bid to close asylum hotel in Epping
news.summary: Epping Forest District Council will continue legal action and appeal against a High Court decision.

news.title: Runaway driver caught by DNA on car airbag
news.summary: Witnesses heard Jamie Challis leaving the scene of the crash in Newport saying “I gotta go”.
